price: Na tukazipasua ardhi kwa chemchem, yakakutana maji kwa jambo lilio kadiriwa.
arabic: وَفَجَّرۡنَا ٱلۡأَرۡضَ عُيُونٗا فَٱلۡتَقَى ٱلۡمَآءُ عَلَىٰٓ أَمۡرٖ قَدۡ قُدِرَ
footnotes: Na tukaipasua ardhi kwa chemchem zikitibuka maji. Yakakutana maji ya mbinguni na maji ya ardhi kuwahiliki, kama alivyo kadiria Mwenyezi Mungu Mtukufu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wafajjarnā al-arḍa ʿuyūnan fal-taqā al-māu ʿalā amrin qad qudira
